List of  Publications
Mika Kettunen
1. Homo- and copolymerization of strained cyclic olefins with new palladium(II) complexes bearing ethylene-bridged heterodonor ligands.
Abu-Surrah, A.S., Lappalainen, K., Kettunen, M.; Repo, T., Leskelä, M., Hodali H.A., Rieger, B. Macromol. Chem. Phys. (2001), 202(5), 599-603.
2. Copolymerization of carbon monoxide with Pd(II) exo-methylenecycloalkane and dienes: synthesis of functionalized aliphatic polyketones.
Kettunen, M., Abu-Surrah, A.S., Repo, T., Leskelä, M. Polym. Int. (2001), 50(11), 1223-1227.
3. Synthesis of new chiral diimine palladium(II) and nickel(II) complexes bearing oxazoline- and myrtanyl-based nitrogen ligands.  structure of the C2-symmetric complex [{(1R,2S)-inda-box}PdCl2].
Abu-Surrah, AS., Kettunen, M., Lappalainen, K., Piironen, List of  Publications
Mika Kettunen
1. Homo- and copolymerization of strained cyclic olefins with new palladium(II) complexes bearing ethylene-bridged heterodonor ligands.
Abu-Surrah, A.S., Lappalainen, K., Kettunen, M.; Repo, T., Leskelä, M., Hodali H.A., Rieger, B. Macromol. Chem. Phys. (2001), 202(5), 599-603.
2. Copolymerization of carbon monoxide with Pd(II) exo-methylenecycloalkane and dienes: synthesis of functionalized aliphatic polyketones.
Kettunen, M., Abu-Surrah, A.S., Repo, T., Leskelä, M. Polym. Int. (2001), 50(11), 1223-1227.
3. Synthesis of new chiral diimine palladium(II) and nickel(II) complexes bearing oxazoline- and myrtanyl-based nitrogen ligands.  structure of the C2-symmetric complex [{(1R,2S)-inda-box}PdCl2].
Abu-Surrah, AS., Kettunen, M., Lappalainen, K., Piironen, U., Klinga, M., Leskelä, M. Polyhedron  (2002), 21(1), 27-31.
4. Hydroformylation of Cyclopentenes, Novel Strategy for Total Syntheses of Carba-D-Fructofuranose.
Seepersaud, M., Kettunen, M., Abu-Surrah, A.S., Repo, T., Voelter, W., Al-Abed, Y. Tetrahedron Lett. (2002), 43(10), 1793-1795.
5. Hydroformylation of glycals using a rhodium(I)(acac)(CO)2 catalyst.
Seepersaud, M., Kettunen, M. Abu-Surrah, A.S., Voelter, W. Al-Abed, Y.  Tetrahedron Lett. (2002), 43(47), 8607-8609.
6. Alternating co- and terpolymerizations of vinylsubstituted phenolic antioxidants with propene and carbon monoxide by a palladium(II)-based catalyst: polyketones containing intramolecular stabilizers.
Auer, M., Kettunen, M., Abu-Surrah, A.S., Leskelä, M., Wilén, C.-E. Polym. Int. (2004) 53 (12), 2015-2019
7. Chiral Zirconium Complexes with Bianiline-Based N4-Donor Ligands.
Kettunen, M., Vedder, C., Schaper, F., Leskelä, M., Mutikainen, I., Brintzinger, H.-H. Organometallics, (2004) 23 (16), 3800 -3807.
8. Synthesis, spectroscopy and molecular structures of new salicylketiminato nickel(II) complexes.
Kettunen, M., Abu-Surrah, A.S., Abdel-Halim, H.M., Repo, T., Leskelä, M., Laine, M., Mutikainen, , Ahlgren M. Polyhedron, (2004), 23, 1649-1656.
9. Alternative coordination modes in palladium(II)-diimino-bispyridine complexes with an axially chiral biphenyl backbone.
Kettunen, M., Vedder, C., Brintzinger, H.-H., Mutikainen, , Leskelä, M., Repo, T., Eur. J. Inorg. Chem. (2005), 6, 1081-1089.
10. Chiral iron(II) and cobalt(II) complexes with biphenyl-bridged bis(pyridylimine) ligands - Syntheses, structures and reactivities
Vedder, C., Schaper, F., Brintzinger, H.-H., Kettunen, M., Babik, S., Fink, G. Eur. J. Inorg. Chem. (2005), 6, 1071-1080.
11. Platinum Group Antitumor Chemistry: Design and development of New Anticancer Drugs Complementary to Cisplatin. (Review)
Abu-Surrah, A.S., Kettunen, M., Curr. Med. Chem. (2006), 13(11), 1337-57.
12. Practical method for 2-hydroxyphenylketimine synthesis
M.T. Räisänen, P. Elo, M. Kettunen, M. Klinga, M. Leskelä, and T. Repo. Synthetic Commun. 2007, 37(11), 1765-1777.
13. Manganese(II) complexes in Ethene Polymerization
K. Yliheikkilä, K. Axenov, M. T. Räisänen, M. Klinga, M. P. Lankinen, M. Kettunen, M. Leskelä and T. Repo. Organometallics, 2007, 26 (4), 980–987
14. A Role for Macrophage Migration Inhibitory Factor in the Neonatal Respiratory Distress Syndrome
K. Kevill, V. Bhandari, M. Kettunen, L. Leng, Y. Mizue, J. Dzuira, M. Reyes-Mujica, C. McDonald, C. O’Connor, J. Baugh, S. C. Donnelly, A. Bazzy-Asaad, R. Bucala, J. Immunol. 2008, 180(1), 601-608.
15. Platinum and Palladium Complexes Bearing New (1R,2R)-()-1,2-
Diaminocyclohexane (DACH)-Based Nitrogen Ligands: Evaluation of the
Complexes Against L1210 Leukemia
Adnan S. AbuSurrah ,  Kettunen, Markku Leskelä, and Yousef Al-Abed. Z. Anorg. Allg. Chem. 2008, 634, 2655-2658.
16. Development of polyketone materials by copolymerizing functional olefins with carbon monoxide using Pd(II) catalyst systems
Mika Kettunen*, Markku Auer, Adnan S. Abu-Surrah; Chapter 1 in "Well-defined Metal Complexes-Catalyzed Polar Polymer Synthesis", Transw. Res. Netw. 2008
17. Bahrain's path to Group III
Kettunen, M.P., Lubes-n-Greases 2011 17 (2), 24-26.
18. No more room for friction in sustainability efforts
Mika Kettunen, Lubes-n-Greases 2019 13 (6), 10-12
19. Lost in friction - wie Drop-in-Lösungen den Durchbruch zu einer nachhaltigen Schmierung bedeuten könnten
Mika Kettunen, Schmierstoff und Schmierung (VSI) 2021 2 (3), 11-12

7. EP3642312A1 Renewable base oil in lubricant formulations
8. EP3642179A1 Method for converting carboxylic acids and esters into base oil hydrocarbons
9. US2024309281A1 Method for treating waste plastic
10. US2025084328A1 Production of base oil components from organic material
11. FI20216372A1 Production of base oil components from organic material
Posters
1. 1H NMR Analysis of BAL Fluid as a Potential Prognostic Tool in Sarcoidosis
M. Kettunen, L. Brennan, P. Newsholme, J.A. Baugh, and S.C. Donnelly, ATS Meeting 2006 San Diego, Proc. Am. Thor. Soc. (2006), 3,
2. Macrophage Migration Inhibitory Factor (MIF) drives growth of Pseudomonas Aeruginosa via it’s isomerase enzymatic activity – potential therapeutic role in Cystic Fibrosis

Presentations and panel discussions
1. Group III Beyond Engine Oil Applications; S. Dörr. M. Kettunen; UNITI Mineral Oil Technology Congress 2011 Stuttgart
2. New Approaches to Wind Turbine Gear Oil Formulation; R. Koschabek, M. Kettunen, M. Müller, C. Wincierz, S. Dörr; 18th International Colloquium Tribology – Industrial and Automotive Lubrication 2012 Stuttgart
3. Base Oils from production to applications; M. Kettunen; 1st Technical Lubricant Industry Seminar, Istanbul 2013

5. How can our industry accelerate its sustainability efforts?; M. Kettunen; Sustainability panel, ICIS Pan American 2020
6. Biofuel producer view on renewable base oils, M. Kettunen; UEIL 2021 Virtual Congress
7. Panel discussion on Sustainability in lubricants industry; UKLA 2022 London
8. An Approach to Life Cycle Assessment, M. Kettunen; UNITI Mineral Oil Technology Congress 2022 Stuttgart
9. The sustainable journey of the Lubricant Industry – Panel discussion; UEIL Annual Congress 2023 Manchester
10. Methodology Landscape for ​PCF-calculations in the lubricant sector, M. Garb and M. Kettunen; UNITI Mineral Oil Technology Congress 2025 Stuttgart
